title: Innovative Instructional Design for Public Health Competency Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of public health fundamentals and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Workplace-centered competency development program for professionals, focusing on case analyses applicable to field situations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core public health issues (e.g., infectious disease management, health disparity reduction) and propose solution strategies
Learners can interpret epidemiological data to draft policy recommendations and create stakeholder persuasion materials
Learners can plan community health promotion projects using digital tools (online collaboration platforms, data visualization software)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
